mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.active, c.position, c.thumb, m.name, m.desc as description FROM category c LEFT JOIN multilang m ON m.id = CONCAT('c',c.id) AND m.locale=#{locale} WHERE c.parent_id = #{parentId} and c.active=true Order by c.position
